properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Please contact station personnel or conductor for assistance. For inbound commuter rail riders, please disembark at Back Bay and return to Forest Hills via the Orange Line.\nFor outbound customers, please take the Orange Line to Back Bay and board the commuter rail at Back Bay. Please contact station personnel for assistance.

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting the station, exit using the Washington Street/Arboretum exit and turn right down the ramp to Hyde Park Avenue. If entering the station from Hyde Park Avenue, turn right to go up the ramp and bear left to the Washington Street/Arboretum entrance.

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Orange Line at Green Street and see station personnel or use the call box to request assistance. If boarding, see station personnel or use the call box at Forest Hills to request assistance. Alternatively, the Route 39 bus service operates from Back Bay to Forest Hills every fifteen minutes or less.
